name: Snow Fort
description:
Fort Snow, a relaxing experience was made for the Australian company Liminal VR. 

Their studio specialises in VR experiences, that we wanted to try, as the Interactive Dreams team. 

The small 3D experience takes you to the South Pole where you can relax and interact with the environment, throw snowballs, build snowmen, etc. In this project I created the UI and most of the map for the game. 

If you have issues with the resolution, try to zoom out by pressing CTRL and - (minus) at the same time. 

Have fun!
